Title: 1.1 Kubernetes Cluster Setup
Body:
Description:
Provision a managed Kubernetes cluster (EKS/GKE or local kind).

Acceptance Criteria:
- kubectl access works
- Nodes are Ready
- Cluster documented

Title: 1.2 Setup CI/CD with GitHub Actions
Body:
Description:
Create a CI/CD pipeline to build, test, and deploy services to Kubernetes.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Workflow triggers on PR/push
- Docker images are built
- Deployment succeeds

Title: 2.1 Kafka Cluster Setup
Body:
Description:
Deploy Kafka for real-time data streaming.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Kafka broker running
- Topics created
- Test producer/consumer works

Title: 2.2 Python Kafka Consumer Service
Body:
Description:
Build a Python microservice that consumes Kafka data and validates records.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Messages consumed
- Invalid records flagged
- Logs written

Title: 2.3 Feature Engineering Pipeline
Body:
Description:
Create data processing pipeline for feature extraction and transformation.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Clean data processed
- Feature set generated
- Ready for model training
